  # cat=basic; type=boolean; label=Enable roundtrip feature (beta!): If you enable roundtrip, you can modify the autogenerated classes and your changes will be kept, even if you modify or rename the model in the extension builder.
enableRoundtrip =
	# cat=basic; type=boolean; label=Advanced mode: Skip hints and warnings. By default the extension builder generates some checks and flash messages to help new users to get started. In advanced mode the code generation for these checks is skipped
advancedMode =
	# cat=basic; type=boolean; label=Make a backup on each save: Should the extension builder make a complete backup of the extension, each time you save it in the extension builder? Only applies if roundtrip is enabled! It is recommended to enable backups if you don't use a versioning system!
backupExtension = 1
  # cat=basic; type=string; label=Backup dir: Name of the backup dir (as subdir of path_SITE or as absolute path)
backupDir = uploads/Tx_ExtensionBuilder/backups
